message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $82?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $75?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. How about we meet at $78?
